latest_revision.text: This is a groover.  Its purpose is to carve a small groove where the stitch line will go before stitching holes are chiseled.  This allows a more low-profile stitch line in order to minimize abrasion in high-wear areas.  The other option is placing a crease with wing dividers or a scratch awl.
